results.summary: The agent report is accurate and logical, with minor omissions in causal chain details and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured but lacks explicit mention of CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent report accurately captured the key metrics.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No practical fixes or historical references were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and metrics with logical reasoning, but lacks specific CPU frequencies and actionable recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and captured the concept of frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue but did not explicitly mention SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified VCORE and DDR percentages but did not mention specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical, correctly ruling out MMDVFS and explaining the high VCORE usage.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and metrics but lacks some details in causal chain and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to MMDVFS and CM/PowerHal, but did not explicitly mention 拉檔 (frequency throttling).

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not mention the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified most of the key metrics but missed some specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause, but could be more detailed.
